tax.description: The tax rate applied to the estimate.

discount.description: The discount percentage applied to the estimate.

subject.description: The subject or description of the estimate.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the estimate was last updated.

accepted_at.description: The date and time when the estimates was accepted.

declined_at.description: The date and time when the estimates was declined.

currency.description: The currency used for the estimate.

client.description: Details about the client associated with the estimates

id.description: The unique identifier of the client.

creator.description: Information about the creator of the estimates

id.description: The unique identifier of the user who created the estimate.
